variable.name: t_tau_m
variable.comment: time stamp of last voltage step

variable.name: tau_h2
variable.comment: time constant of slow inactivation gate

variable.name: tau_h1
variable.comment: time constant of fast inactivation gate

variable.name: tau_m_measured
variable.comment: measured time until difference between na.act.n and m_stead is < 1e-6

variable.name: vc.v_stim
variable.comment: input voltage (needs to be defined externally)

variable.name: l2.i
variable.comment: Current flowing from pin p to pin n

variable.name: na.inact_total
variable.comment: total inactivation resulting from fast and slow inactivation terms

variable.name: na.inact_slow.steady
variable.comment: value that n would reach if v_gate was held constant

variable.name: na.inact_slow.n
variable.comment: ratio of molecules in open conformation

variable.name: na.inact_fast.n
variable.comment: ratio of molecules in open conformation

variable.name: na.act.beta
variable.comment: rate of transfer from open to closed conformation

variable.name: na.act.alpha
variable.comment: rate of transfer from closed to open conformation

variable.name: na.act.n
variable.comment: ratio of molecules in open conformation

variable.name: l2.use_init
variable.comment: determines whether initial value for v is used

variable.name: na_p
variable.comment: cell membrane permeability for Na+ ions

variable.name: d_step
variable.comment: duration for which voltage is held constant between steps

variable.name: na.inact_slow.tau
variable.comment: time constant for obtaining steady state (i.e. time until difference between n and steady has reduced by a factor of 1/e)

variable.name: na.inact_fast.tau
variable.comment: time constant for obtaining steady state (i.e. time until difference between n and steady has reduced by a factor of 1/e)

variable.name: na.act.tau
variable.comment: time constant for obtaining steady state (i.e. time until difference between n and steady has reduced by a factor of 1/e)

variable.name: na.inact_fast.steady
variable.comment: value that n would reach if v_gate was held constant

variable.name: na.act.steady
variable.comment: steady state achieved if current voltage is held constant

variable.name: vc.stim.i
variable.comment: Current flowing from pin p to pin n

variable.name: vc.stim.v
variable.comment: Voltage between pin p and n (= p.v - n.v) as input signal

variable.name: na.i
variable.comment: Current flowing from pin p to pin n

variable.name: na.v
variable.comment: Voltage drop of the two pins (= p.v - n.v)

variable.name: l2.v
variable.comment: Voltage drop of the two pins (= p.v - n.v)

variable.name: vc.v
variable.comment: Voltage drop of the two pins (= p.v - n.v)

equations.equation:
vc.g.p.i + vc.i - vc.n.i = 0.0
vc.g.p.i
vc.i
vc.n.i
0.0

l2.i + na.i_ion - vc.i = 0.0
l2.i
na.i_ion
vc.i
0.0

der(na.act.n) = na.act.alpha * (1.0 - na.act.n) - na.act.beta * na.act.n
na.act.n
na.act.alpha
1.0
na.act.n
na.act.beta
na.act.n

der(na.inact_fast.n) = (h_steady - na.inact_fast.n) / tau_h1
na.inact_fast.n
h_steady
na.inact_fast.n
tau_h1

der(na.inact_slow.n) = (na.inact_slow.steady - na.inact_slow.n) / tau_h2
na.inact_slow.n
na.inact_slow.steady
na.inact_slow.n
tau_h2

na.open_ratio = na.act.n ^ 3.0 * na.inact_total
na.open_ratio
na.act.n
3.0
na.inact_total

na.i_open = InaMo.Functions.Biochemical.ghkFlux(vc.v_stim, temp, na_in, na.ion_ex, na.ion_p, na.ion_z)
na.i_open
vc.v_stim
temp
na_in
na.ion_ex
na.ion_p
na.ion_z

na.i_ion = na.open_ratio * na.i_open
na.i_ion
na.open_ratio
na.i_open

der(vc.v_stim) = l2.i / l2.c
vc.v_stim
l2.i
l2.c

m_steady = na.act.alpha / (na.act.alpha + na.act.beta)
m_steady
na.act.alpha
na.act.alpha
na.act.beta

na.inact_total = 0.635 * na.inact_fast.n + 0.365 * na.inact_slow.n
na.inact_total
0.635
na.inact_fast.n
0.365
na.inact_slow.n

whenEquation.WhenOperator:
reinit(vc.v_stim, pre(vc.v_stim) + v_step)
vc.v_stim
vc.v_stim
v_step
